computation so that's the dual inverter control the battery management system is all about reading battery
voltages trying to do state of charge the state of health prediction uh and then there's a secure communication stack which
allows you to bundle some of this information and send it out to the s 32g finally the
application that rides on top of all of those lower level functions is an energy management system that's an
algorithm that's developed by the mathworks it's called adaptive equivalent consumption minimization strategy
and its whole job is to make sure that we are being efficient with the amount of energy that we're using the vehicle as it moves down the
